title.rendered: EAC Student Featured on THV11 News

content.rendered: A University of Arkansas at Little Rock and EAC team member, Andrew Bomberger, was recently named “Arkansan of the Day” by THV11 News. View that segment, here!

excerpt.rendered: A University of Arkansas at Little Rock and EAC team member, Andrew Bomberger, was recently named “Arkansan of the Day” by THV11 News. View that segment, here!
